alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:40PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rockingham, Strafford, southeastern Grafton, Belknap, eastern Merrimack and Carroll Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 739 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Plymouth to near Concord. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Concord, Rochester, Laconia, Conway, Franklin, Moultonborough, Plymouth, Ossipee, Meredith, Northwood, Hooksett, Barrington, Farmington, Lebanon, Hopkinton, Loudon, Alton, Barnstead, Epsom and Gilmanton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 0 and 5. Interstate 93 between mile markers 30 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Strafford
